reviews.name: Jane Cooper
reviews.text: Keep the soil evenly moist for the healthiest growth. If the sun gets too hot, Chinese cabbage tends to "bolt" or go to seed; in long periods of heat, some kind of shade may be helpful. Watch out for snails, as they will harm the plants.

reviews.name: Jacob Jones
reviews.text: Vivamus eget euismod magna. Nam sed lacinia nibh, et lacinia lacus.

reviews.name: Ralph Edwards
reviews.text: 200+ Canton Pak Choi Bok Choy Chinese Cabbage Seeds Heirloom Non-GMO Productive Brassica rapa VAR. chinensis, a.k.a. Canton's Choice, Bok Choi, from USA
